channel.title: [508] log in NAME filter
channel.description:
hey i would like to filter players from making there username "mod james" or what ever. i know how to do it on a 317 but not on my 508. can some one please help me disable "mod" "admin" "owner" so when a player tries to make an account it gives them an error "your account has been disabled" becuase they has mod admin or owner in the name?
THANKS,
Brandon

item.title: [508] log in NAME filter
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok thanks any help for the 508?

Read full topic

item.title: [508] log in NAME filter
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Simple fix for delta scape… unsure how you could do it for 508’s


String Mod = "mod"
if (playerName.startsWith(Mod.equalsIgnoreCase(Mod))) {
    jailed = 1;
}
String Admin = "admin"
if (playerName.startsWith(Admin.equalsIgnoreCase(Admin))) {
    jailed = 1;
}

//simple fix…

Read full topic
